blogs.title: Tesla hit with right-to-repair class action lawsuits alleging monopolistic practices
blogs.description: A proposed class action lawsuit was brought in US District Court, Northern District of California, by Model S owner Virginia Lambrix on Tuesday. She says Tesla caused her to suffer lengthy delays in repairing or maintaining her vehicle.Read Entire Article
